channel.title: Flags on GBIF Data Blog

item.title: GBIF Issues & Flags
item.description: “With great power comes great responsibility”, is a proverb that emerged during French Revolution but popularized by the Spider-Man comic books written by Stan Lee. This slogan can be applied also when we share and use biodiversity data, especially through a worldwide platform as GBIF.org. Publishers play an essential role not simply in sharing datasets, but also in managing their quality, completeness and usefulness and ensuring their integration and value within GBIFâ€™s global knowledge base (GBIF.
